content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Processing Line at x=-2.0, y=-76.0
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (x=-2.0, y=-76.0) connected to
- Stone furnace (x=-1.0, y=-74.0) connected to
- Burner inserter (x=0.5, y=-74.5) that moves items to
- Iron chest (x=1.5, y=-74.5)
- Additional iron chest (x=0.5, y=-72.5) connected to the furnace
Current status: Mining drill is out of fuel, furnace has no ingredients

### Copper Ore Processing Line at x=-21.0, y=-73.0
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (x=-21.0, y=-73.0) that drops to
- Iron chest (x=-21.5, y=-74.5) containing copper ore
- Burner inserter (x=-20.5, y=-74.5) moves items to
- Stone furnace (x=-19.0, y=-74.0)
Current status: Mining drill is working, furnace is full of copper plates

### Iron Plate Processing Line at x=3.0, y=-73.0
Consists of:
- Iron chest (x=1.5, y=-74.5) containing iron plates
- Burner inserter (x=2.5, y=-74.5) oriented to move items to
- Stone furnace (x=3.0, y=-73.0) connected to
- Stone furnace (x=5.0, y=-73.0)
- Burner inserter (x=6.5, y=-72.5) moves items to
- Iron chest (x=7.5, y=-72.5)
- Additional iron chest (x=3.5, y=-71.5) connected to both furnaces
Current status: All furnaces have fuel but no ingredients

ERROR TIPS

### Incorrect Inserter Configuration
- The inserter at x=2.5, y=-74.5 has incorrect pickup/drop positions (pickup: x=2.5, y=-73.5, drop: x=2.5, y=-75.5) that don't align with the intended source and destination
- Ensure inserter orientation and position allows it to properly reach both the source and destination entities

### Resource Management
- Mining drill at x=-2.0, y=-76.0 is out of fuel
- Always ensure mining equipment has sufficient fuel before starting operations

### Inventory Management
- Attempting to insert coal when none is available in inventory
- Check inventory contents before attempting to insert items into entities

### Production Line Efficiency
- Multiple furnaces have no ingredients despite having fuel
- Ensure proper item flow through the production line by checking connections and inserter configurations
